request.name: present_surface
request.description:
This requests the system compositor to display surface on output. Each client of the system compositor can have at most one surface per output at any one time.
Subsequent requests with the same output replace the surface.

request.name: ready
request.description: This informs the system compositor that the client is ready to be displayed. A client should send this request after it has created its surfaces and performed its initial rendering.
